name: Flake: The Legend of Snowblind
storyline:
Memories of the GREAT WAR still echo the island even thou it ended little more then thousand years ago.
When the coldness came long lasting harmony started fading.
Barely noticeable, slow unsettling changes started... Something strange and sinister is growing unnoticed.
Balance of GOOD and EVIL was broken.
This time the cold came strong and doesn't seem to linger...lasting for years now.
It was named THE ENDLESS WINTER.
Snow has covered the Nesca Island but the prophecies speak of even worse to come.
People are growing restless and hungry.

Was it just by simple chance that exactly at these times FLAKE came along?
Lost in Whiteness on the Mountain top, still not knowing that his destiny is strongly connected with the FATE OF THE WORLD itself.
Little could he know what amazing adventures lay in front of him.
Oh, yes...little did he know;
that he might be travelling trough time, seeing glimpses of the dark and burned FUTURE;
that he would be meeting long passed warriors in the SPIRITUAL WORLD, the place where all good spirits dwell;
that he will find himself in LIMBO, where Souls are trapped for ETERNAL punishment and solitude;
Along his path he will be meeting ADORING, FUNNY and DANGEROUS characters.
Will he manage to find the way out of the psychopathic Ghost's MIND MAZE where time is
INFINITE?
Even thou his chance is alike of a snowball's chance in HELL, he must find THE WAY.
summary:
Embark on this mystical journey in the role of Flake, an incredible creature.
Will you be able to walk the thin white line between good and evil?
What will you do with your chance to save the world that is hanging on a thread?
